S.FORM: Cipurungan Gaga mniq Taytung Kwansancn ka alang Cipurungan. 149 sapah ka kneegu na sapah, 430 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnpusu seejiq o mangal 37 niqan 157 hiyi sp, rahuq na uxay tnpusu seejiq o mangal 63 niqan 273 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Amis32 , Bunun3 , ni rahuq na o1 . Pusu nniqan alang Kndadax mnrmuxan Tanah Tunux siida kika phiyug ka alang nii. Nniqan alang Nyusan Taytung Kwansan cng Rijungri. Gasuc Saw hari mniq sngayan rulu qrngul Kwansan 1km hiya, gaga mniq sengtaw 9 haw kungru 346.5 km hiya, mniq siyaw hraan hidaw elug rulu qrngul, nhiya nanaq ka phiyug kingal alang, kika tmhangan dha truma elug rulu qrngul . Tiri lnglingay Breenux. Pgkla patas cyawtung Mgrig rulu: Taypey>kwotaw 3 haw>kwotaw 3 cya syeyn lutuc elug Taypey>elug Wunsan>syeyn 106)>syeyn 109)>Peyyi kungru>Pinhay kungru>Suhwa kungru>Hwadung cungku kungru>elug Heping>elug Jnay>Dhuq. Klegan nealang seejiq Amis. Djiyun kari Kari Amis, Tlu ni Khilang. Pnaah alang Mniq saw mnrmuxan Tanah Tunux Dacng hngkwasan 8 1919) siida, iyux krana qmpah kika qhuni Cangnaw ka seejiq Nihung, kika snqulan kndadax gqian hidaw seejiq khilang miyah dmayaw qmraq qhuni Cangnaw. Mnhdu mniq hngkwasan 1929, niqan dumu empsaping asi nniqan hini, kika muda tmbgurah dxgal, miyah mtmay tnhjil tna nsgan uri, kiya ni phiyug kingal gburah alang seejiq khilang. Kiya ni mniq saw bukuy Minkwo hngkwasan 50 do, niqan kndadax Reykungse seejiq Amis ka mtmay, kika pryuxun ka kndsan nniqan alang khilang nii da. Pnyahan pnatas
